text: The death of the judgment debtor after the execution issued on the judgment has been delivered to the marshal does not affect his authority to proceed against the property bound by it.
historical:

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Death of judgment debtor after delivery of execution.
